description: Have no fear, Marty the Marmot is here. An alpine-loving social butterfly that equally loves his downtime, the Marmot, like this soft comfy longsleeve tee, is always ready for a good time. Whether you're going big on the mountain with friends or going home to hibernate after hard earned miles or elevation gains under the sun, you'll find yourself grabbing this soft recycled polyester cotton blend tee all year round.
name: Marmot Backcountry Marty Tee LS - Mens
